mapper.select: SELECT CODE_CODE, CODE_INFO, CODE_CONTENT, CODE_LUSER, CODE_LDATE, CODE_USE FROM opener_code WHERE CODE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{cod}, '%')

SELECT CODE_CODE, CODE_INFO, CODE_CONTENT, CODE_LUSER, CODE_LDATE, CODE_USE, SUBSTRING(CODE_CODE, 1,3) AS SUBCODE FROM opener_code WHERE CODE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{cod1}, '%') OR CODE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{cod2}, '%')
SELECT CODE_CODE, CODE_INFO, CODE_CONTENT, CODE_LUSER, CODE_LDATE, CODE_USE, SUBSTRING(CODE_CODE, 1,3) AS SUBCODE FROM opener_code group by SUBCODE

SELECT CODE_CODE, CODE_INFO, CODE_CONTENT, CODE_LUSER, DATE_FORMAT(CODE_LDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CODE_LDATE, CODE_USE FROM opener_code WHERE 1=1
AND CODE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{cod}, '%')
order by code_code

SELECT NOTICE_KEY, NOTICE_IMPORT, NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_FUSER, DATE_FORMAT(NOTICE_FDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS NOTICE_FDATE, NOTICE_LUSER, NOTICE_LDATE, NOTICE_REAL_FILENAME, NOTICE_FILENAME, NOTICE_FILEPATH, CODE1.CODE_CONTENT AS IMPORT, CODE2.CODE_CONTENT AS TYPE, ADMIN.ADMIN_NAME, NOTICE_VIEWS FROM opener_notice LEFT JOIN opener_code CODE1 ON CODE1.CODE_CODE = NOTICE_IMPORT LEFT JOIN opener_code CODE2 ON CODE2.CODE_CODE = NOTICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN opener_user_admin ADMIN ON ADMIN.ADMIN_KEY = NOTICE_FUSER WHERE NOTICE_KEY = #{noticeKey} order by notice_fdate desc
